about_the_game:
Every noise has a consequence you don't want to know about. Hold your breath and immerse yourself in King Of Silence, a horrific experience where the strange, the paranoïa and the frightening are combined.

Story



It was the last Sunday of the summer vacations, and my friends and I had spent the whole day at the beach. As usual, on the way home, we passed this building, which looks like an old religious temple. Everyone thinks it's haunted, so we never venture too close. Deep down, I know there's something wrong with this place. Many people in the village say that something or someone has been living there for centuries, and doesn't like the noise.

Play as a child locked up in this old abandoned building where lives the King of Silence, a demon that hates noises. Don't panic, stay calm and above all, do not make any noises, because the more you'll do it, the more the King will free himself.

Gameplay



In King of Silence, the only tool you have is your flashlight. To get through the game you will have to explore, light up and interact with your environment while avoiding making noise.

You also have a sanity system, which may or may not decrease depending on how you behave in a situation. This sanity will change your experience and its conclusion. Be careful.


Key Features

  • - A heavy and distressing atmosphere
  • - A terrifying demon
  • - Immersive sound design
  • - A flashlight that might come in handy

Environment



The game takes place in an old religious temple that has been abandoned. No one knows what could have happened here or what religion was practised here. Walk through this place, explore it, and you may learn a little more about its origin and the entity that occupies it.

short_description: Embark on a chilling journey in King of Silence, a first-person horror game where silence is survival. Trapped in a dark, abandoned temple, you must quietly uncover its secrets and the eerie legend of the King of Silence to find your escape. Make a sound, and it may be your last.
